title.label: Worth way more than the price!

content.label: I‚Äôm usually too lazy to write reviews, but by ruddy King George, this game is worth buying. First off, I was surprised at the vastness of Dust. It‚Äôs a huge game for the price. I just finished my first play-through and feel like I missed a lot. It definitely has replay ability, and I‚Äôll be playing again soon. The only complaint I have is that sometimes it is difficult to tell what‚Äôs going on during combat when there are several enemies on the screen at the same time. However, this barely diminishes the overall pleasure I derive from playing this amazing game. I would highly recommend this to any platform fans out there. Please tell me there is a sequel...

All of these great reviews are fake! So beware.

To begin you need to figure out the disappearance of the chunk of meat. That‚Äôs the first thing you do starting a game. Unfortunately it‚Äôs supposed to appear in your inventory. It just disappears in my game. So I deleted Dust from my iPad and put it on my iPhone 7+. Still no meat. Or rather, it simply disappears. Which is pretty much what this game is. Crap.

Now I‚Äôve started THREE bloody games and THEY-DO-NOT-SAVE! This piece of blithering garbage is driving me crazy. How frigging basic can you get? You‚Äôd think with the out-the-ceiling price the least it would be able to do is SAVE! 

You‚Äôd be wrong. Never regretted buying an app so much in my life. And the App Store could care less.

This app is flawed from beginning to end‚Äîand even the end. Press the button to ‚ÄúEnd Game‚Äù. Great, but the only way you‚Äôll get back in is by rebooting your machine. 

Have fun!

title.label: This game is better on Iphone then on Xbox 360!!

content.label: I absolutely love this game, I‚Äôve bought it on every console I own! I‚Äôm honestly not sure what I like best about it, from the crafting to the combos, to the stunning scenery and crafty map design (seriously on hardcore I spent 4 hours trying to get through the caverns, CURSE THOSE POISON MUSHROOMS) I bought this game and was very impressed by how customizable the controls were you can move each button to anywhere on the screen! Anyways if you like side scrolling RPG‚Äôs look no further because this is the pinnacle.
Loved every minute of this game.  Amazing graphics, gameplay and storyline!!  I need more games like this in my life!

title.label: This I the best game I‚Äôve every played

content.label: ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Dust: AET is without a doubt one of my favorite video games of all time.
I played it on Xbox and PC previously, but I was extremely skeptical when I saw this mobile port.
I‚Äôve always been skeptical of mobile gaming, especially so when it comes to complex games like Dust, but this completely blew me away.
The game controlled much more smoothly than I would have ever expected possible on a phone. Obviously, it plays best on a controller, but considering the constraints of a mobile phone screen, I can‚Äôt criticize the touch controls at all.
As for the game itself, I could sing its praise forever. The gameplay is fun and satisfying, the art and music are beautiful, the story and characters are excellent; there‚Äôs a reason it‚Äôs one of my all-time favorites.
If you‚Äôve never played this game before, I would definitely recommend playing on PC or console first, no question.
However, if you‚Äôre a returning fan, and skeptical of the mobile port like I was, absolutely it is worth getting.

This is my first ever review for a game and it‚Äôs a good one! I just absolutely love the visuals and all the time that was spent on them! Also the voice acting is perfect! It matches the design and personality of the characters. My favorite part is how simple the controls are! Some games like this are really complex, but you guys just made them much better to understand! And finally the beautiful soundtrack all of them are AMAZING!!!! Lots of love and keep up the good work!

No wonder this game has received such praise. A full 10+ hours of content guaranteed with immersive story, stunning animation and music, satisfying combat that‚Äôs adjustable (even mid game!) for both casual and hardcore players alike, and secrets that aren‚Äôt irritating to find but are hidden enough that you have to poke around a bit. 
It‚Äôs a lighthearted experience. Don‚Äôt expect difficulty except on harder modes.

The controls are fluid and the game is polished. This is PC game quality on your phone. I haven‚Äôt been this satisfied with a mobile game since Alto‚Äôs Adventure and these are the only two games I‚Äôve truly enjoyed on my phone. And combat is truly satisfying, especially parries. The voice acting is superb as well. Fidget doesn‚Äôt break the fourth wall nearly as much as some reviewers claim she does.

The story isn‚Äôt unique, but literally everything else is flawless, and the story is still well presented. It‚Äôs one of those games that leaves an imprint on you long after it‚Äôs finished.
PS - the normal difficulty isn‚Äôt actually difficult at all. I would recommend the normal difficulty even if you consider yourself a casual or new player to the genre.

I bought this game for the Xbox years ago, unbelievable replay value and combat elegance. The graphics are stunning compared to other games, each movement and attack is on-point and perfectly timed that I cannot find One thing to complain about this game. I bought it, I‚Äôm enjoying it all over again and I even can now on the go. Worth the 5 Star Rating and every cent
Buy this game, YOU CANNOT BE DISAPPOINTED
Love this game! It‚Äôs graphics are great and you get to adjust how the controls are placed! Only wish it was available for  Android users too.

Check out the TouchArcade forums if you want to hear the latest from a passionate developer with an intuitive approach to his craft and appreciation for fans of the title. This gem is nothing short of spectacular, and it runs at a smooth 60 frames per second on compatible devices. The lower resolution is a consequence of (all compatible) device limitations‚Äîa necessary compromise. Otherwise, the one-man team behind this epic would not have bothered with the platform. So, if you like stunning visuals, smooth gaming, and exquisite touch control implementation give it a try. And thanks for supporting the iPhone X!
It's a fun, amazing, and beautiful game. Hope a second comes around.

title.label: This Game is amazing and beautiful to look at

title.label: A story skillfully woven in my mind

content.label: Dean, if you are listening, Elizabeth would be exponentially proud of you. The game is awesome, the play is great, the music is on point, but the most important thing is that the story made me feel. Even after the 7 time of watching the ending, I still feel that humble hurt in my heart. Well done Dean. Well done indeed.
There have been very few games that have made me cry. This is one of them.

title.label: The BEST single player game I have played!

content.label: From the scenery to the characters, and music, this is easily one of my favorite games!  It made me laugh, it made me cry, it made me feel epic!  The voice acting is excellent too!  Here's hoping for a sequel!

First of all, I have much respect for the sole developer of this game (other than voice acting, localizations, etc.) for having the passion and the drive to complete this masterpiece. I think it's safe to say most players, myself included, would not assume that this game was the work of a single person. Ignoring subjective opinions regarding the art style, this game is an example of everything a Metroidvania game should be, and more. It's clear that a lot of time & energy went into programming the phenomenal controls. The intuitive movement & actions create a combat that's visceral & satisfying, yet still challenging. I had a blast playing through ths mobile version of this game despite having completed it on the PC.

title.label: This game is like a beautiful dream!

content.label:
What an amazing game from an amazing developer.  This game has been constantly supported and upgraded.

I played for a year with touchscreens, but recently I got a Steelseries Nimbus, and its become twice as fun.  Great support for MFI controllers in this game.

Also, recently the game was given a visual facelift, and it did wonders on my 10.5‚Äù screen.  It looks much better now.  Highly recommend this game, as its one of the best side scrollers on the App Store.  Great story, and a awesome musical score.

Thumbs way up!
Only problem I have, it's optimized for iPhone X screen. It goes beyond the notch, and thus cuts out a piece of the game.

I‚Äôve played a lot of games but I‚Äôve never seen anything like Dust: AET before. Honestly, this game was so amazing. The plot was great and I truly felt like I knew Dust. I would certainly love a second game! The ending was so touching... I cried. Everything about this game was amazing and I don‚Äôt know how anyone could hate it. People have their reasons I suppose. I overall loved it. Keep up the good work! ( think about that second game though)

I don‚Äôt know if ‚Äúmiraculousness‚Äù is a word, but I chose to use it anyway. This game is one of the greatest games I‚Äôve ever (and I mean EVER) laid my eyes on!! üòÉüòÉ I didn‚Äôt think it was possible for a game like this to be THAT good. Fidget is adorable. ‚ù§Ô∏èüòç Dust is brave and heroic. Ginger is also cute and very gentle. General Gaius is a worthy opponent (and a really great final boss). There is not even HALF a con in this pure, pure masterpiece!!

title.label: Beautiful game of all time for iPhone

content.label: This game itself has made me cry in certain parts of cut scenes as well as laugh at the silliness of the voice over and animations. For as difficult as some levels can be, it makes up on charm, and beautiful character design. These are characters you will get attached to like a movie, and it will draw you to keep playing to find out what happens. Forever will be the best in my opinion

I‚Äôve seen a lot of garbage on the AppStore but this game is something new. No cash grabbing in it, no micro transactions original content, and an amazing story mixed with unbeatable combat mechanics. This game gives me hope for the Appstore and after all of the clones and cash grabs I've seen, this game is a shining star to those other games. So I recommend buying this game if you want something new. Heck I‚Äôve almost beaten the game while writing this review and that 6 bucks I spent was probably the best 6 bucks I have ever spent on the AppStore. Buy this game, it won‚Äôt disappoint.

title.label: The best game I have ever played

content.label: You can get very invested in the story and i felt many joys and sorrows throughout the whole of the game.

Mere minutes ago I completed this game and I must confess it‚Äôs now one of my top favorites. The story surrounding our mysterious protagonist rapidly drew me in and the animated cutscenes were beautiful, despite the style being slightly outdated. I was blown away by the fluid mechanics and adaptable controls! What‚Äôs most impressive is simply the fact that the developer, Dean Dodrill, made it all independently!

Since it‚Äôs release back in August of 2012, Dean has stated that there will one day be a sequel! With his second game Never Stop Sneakin‚Äô being released this holiday season, I‚Äôm sure it will still be a while. However, I‚Äôm positive that it will be well worth the wait!

content.label: First of all. I would like to say thanks you. For releasing an absolutely beautiful game. Secondly the combat engine isn‚Äôt fantastic reminds me of console RPG games!. I love and enjoy every thing about this game. Best iOS game I‚Äôve ever paid for. You guys did an amazing job!. Thank you and keep up the awesome work!. I. Any wait for the nex my release of dust. title.label: Good but there is one design detail really throws me off

content.label: In general this is an extremely well done game. I deducted one star because it is just impossible to climb the lianas to one of the mansions in sorrowing meadow. I think it may work better to operate on X Box but it is just impossible on iPhone touchscreen

Dust: An Elysian Tale was delightful surprise from the very beginning! The story, characters and voice acting are all top notch. I found myself enthralled from the start and really enjoyed the adventure all the way through. Combat is fun and satisfying and enemies remain challenging throughout the game. If you love a good action RPG game, then there‚Äôs really no need to deliberate for this game. It‚Äôs truly a gem and worth every penny paid!
When I open this game on my new iPad, all I see is a purple screen with a green character frozen in the middle of it.  No controls; no movement; nothing else.  ...pretty dull.

Wow! I was actually very impressed with this game! Great work! Combat style, controls, artistic graphics and great voice acting/soundtrack! I am almost never a fan of any kind of Japanese style/anime style video games but this one is a keeper and well worth the money spent!

I first played this game on consuls and this is a very accurate representation of the game. The pc version is also very nice, and one of the best ports done in a long time. The story is so in depth and well done, it's hard to say much wrong about it. It's a very unique beat um up style game, with equipment and so many cool tricks you can do, like the Ariel dust storm. Understanding the games mechanics to find secrets, as well as using clues you got many hours ago is brilliant. Although, one complaint is the game can be a little easy at times, but that problem is solved with harder difficulties. Normal mode was just too easy. Also, the phone doesn't nearly show how good the controls are. On console and pc, the controls feel fluid and tight, making it only your fault for getting hit. The phone is just to hard to control. Overall, it's a great experience, but if you want the true experience, get the console version.

I know whoever made this game put a ton of work into it but the voice acting on this game is unbearable. That coupled with the clumsy touch screen controls make the game not worth it. Maybe on console if metroidvania is your thing, but on a phone it's rough
